ygData.subject: Re: Missing Songs!!
ygData.msgSnippet: This makes all the more likely we won t get this ability, since nothing we do has a component... ... -- We now return to the non-stop rock. Matt DeBarger
ygData.messageBody:
This makes all the more likely we won't get this ability, since nothing
we do has a component...

kim@... wrote:
>
> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Tue, 15 Feb 2000, Papa Legba wrote:
> >
> > > Level 47: Summon Corpse song (like the necro one)
> >
> > I think they see this as a necro-only ability.
>
> The Summon Corpse spell requires a component that costs like
> 100pp, weighs a ton (so you can't carry too many), and is a
> container (so you can't store too many at the bank). It is
> *not* something necros can cast at the drop of a hat.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
